thread.title: Jim attending ex's funeral in Ireland
thread.title_full: Jim attending ex's funeral in Ireland

title: Jim attending ex's funeral in Ireland
text:
Jim attending ex's funeral in Ireland Fri, 09 Oct 2015 12:50 PM Share Your Email Jim Carrey. AFP 
Jim Carrey is heading to Ireland for his ex-girlfriend Cathriona White’s funeral following her suicide. 
According to TMZ , the funeral will be taking place tomorrow (October 10, 2015) at her hometown of Cappawhite in Ireland. 
The site adds that White "will be laid to rest next to her father" who passed away in 2012. 
As previously reported by TMZ, Carrey is taking care of everything financially as he paid for White’s family’s plane trip from Ireland to Los Angeles so that they could "collect her body". 
He even paid for their "hotel stay" and offered to fork out cash for the funeral, TMZ previously reported. 
White killed herself last week after taking pills prescribed to Carrey’s alias, with previous reports by TMZ adding that her death was a few days after Carrey had broken up with her. 
The site also added that White died on the "third anniversary of her father's death". 
It has now been reported by TMZ that White "had been married to another man", and during her time together with Carrey, she was "never divorced". Staff Reporter
